Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND SUBSTANCE ABUSE
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO ALCOHOLISM AND SUBSTANCE ABUSE
REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND SUBSTANCE ABUSE

Title: Directs a review and report concerning the prescribing and treatment history of persons in this state who suffered fatal and nonfatal opiate overdoses
Summary: Directs the department of health, in cooperation with various state offices and agencies to review, evaluate, and make recommendations concerning the prescribing and treatment history of persons in this state who suffered fatal and nonfatal opiate overdoses.
ActClause: AN ACT to direct the department of health, in cooperation with various state offices and agencies, to review, evaluate, and make recommendations concerning the prescribing and treatment history of persons in this state who suffered fatal and nonfatal opiate overdoses
